member.name: XAPO_REGISTRATION_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Describes general characteristics of an XAPO. Used withIXAPO::GetRegistrationProperties, CXAPOParametersBase::CXAPOParametersBase, andCXAPOBase::CXAPOBase.

member.name: XAPO_REGISTRATION_PROPERTIES.clsid
member.summary: COM class ID for use with the CoCreateInstance function.

summary.para: XAPO property flags that describe the general characteristics of process behavior. These flags are described in the following table.

For example, consider an effect which may be ran in stereo to 5.1 mode ormono to mono mode. When set to stereo to 5.1, it will be run with separateinput and output buffers as format conversion is not permitted in-place.However, if configured to run mono to mono, the same XAPO can be runin-place. Thus the same implementation may be conveniently reusedfor various input/output configurations, while taking advantage ofin-place processing when possible.

member.name: XAPO_REGISTRATION_PROPERTIES.MinInputBufferCount
member.summary: Minimum number of input streams required for processing.

member.name: XAPO_REGISTRATION_PROPERTIES.MaxInputBufferCount
member.summary: Maximum number of input streams required for processing.

member.name: XAPO_REGISTRATION_PROPERTIES.MinOutputBufferCount
member.summary: Minimum number of output streams required for processing.

member.name: XAPO_REGISTRATION_PROPERTIES.MaxOutputBufferCount
member.summary: Maximum number of output streams required for processing.
